testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: Sarosh's expertise in AI and cloud transformation was instrumental in modernizing our infrastructure. His strategic vision and technical leadership helped us achieve a 40% improvement in operational efficiency.

testimonials.content: Sarosh's leadership in our cloud migration project was exceptional. His ability to align technical solutions with business objectives resulted in significant cost savings and improved scalability.
